dmca.title: FW: [EV1-C1974508Y] Illegal Copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ________________________________ From: Carla knir [mailto:carla.knir@gmail.com] Posted At: Wednesday, November 29, 2006 11:28 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: FW: [EV1-C1974508Y] Illegal Copyright Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1974508Y] Illegal Copyright Offer a serving pirate of the game lineage2 not illegal? http://www.ncsoft.com/eng/NCPress/View.asp?hSeq=1 http://www.fbi.gov/ipr/ It would like to make one denounces against the site http://www.kosglad.com.br/ housed in IP 67.15.159.107 property of the MaxiHost. Its customer possesss a site where she divulges, she uses and if she appropriates of illegal material, the name Lineage II (lineage 2) is of property of the NCSfot ( www.ncsoft.com) and in all the cited site the names Lineage II are used and NCSoft without any authorization beyond the same one if using of this site for spreading of an illegal service (pirate) where this supplies to its users access a server of the game Lineage 2 (software of property of the NCSoft) illegal is directing still this message the producer of the software ( www.ncsoft.com) which is together with the FBI acting against this type of practical (piracy). (http://www.ncsoft.com/eng/NCPress/View.asp?hSeq=1 ) (http://www.fbi.gov/ipr/) On 11/29/06, Copyright wrote: To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, November 29, 2006 1:02 AM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1974508Y] Illegal Copyright Subject: [EV1-C1974508Y] Illegal Copyright ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. boundary="----=_Part_35850_26135067.1164804124841" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: carla.knir@gmail.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 29 Nov 2006 12:42:21.0630 (UTC) FILETIME=[D03115E0:01C713B3] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I'm here to inform your client on IP address 67.15.159.107 are using illegal software, and this software are property of NCSoft ( *www.ncsoft.com* ) and we will make a denunce to NCSoft to comunicate this illegal content they are emulating the Lineage 2 Server, and only NCSoft can make a server of this game. Regards, Carla MIME element (text/html)
